header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 1, page 1, line 3, leave out “28 October 2011” and insert “31 December 2060”
000: Clause 2, page 1, line 8, leave out subsection (2)
000: Clause 3, page 2, line 16, at end insert—
“(7) No consent granted or refused under this section shall be challenged in any court of the United Kingdom.”
000: Clause 5, leave out Clause 5 and insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentOne: This Bill shall come into force when all the relevant Commonwealth Parliaments have given their assent to all of its provisions.”

text.quote: 000: Clause 5, page 2, line 29, leave out subsection (2) and insert—
“(2) The other provisions of this Act shall be brought into force by statutory instrument subject to the approval of both Houses of Parliament.”
